name: TIC - Tetris Impossible Challenge
description:
TIC - Tetris Impossible Challenge is a new twist on the classic Tetris game. With increasing difficulty levels and an endless challenge mode, this game will keep you entertained for hours.  

Features:  

-Endless challenge mode for endless fun 

-Increasing difficulty levels for a progressively challenging experience 

-Intuitive controls for easy familiarity with the game 

-Eye-catching graphics for an immersive gaming experience 

Recommended age: All ages
